shortDescription: SQL Injection exists in the Zh BaiduMap 3.0.0.1 component for Joomla! via the id parameter in a getPlacemarkDetails, getPlacemarkHoverText, getPathHoverText, or getPathDetails request.
vulnerabilityName: zh_baidumap_project zh_baidumap Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
